alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 14 at 1:52PM CDT until July 14 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Chickasaw County in northeastern Mississippi... Southwestern Monroe County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 152 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located near Trebloc, or 11 miles south of Okolona, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Public confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Aberdeen, Trebloc, Prairie, McCondy, Binford, East Aberdeen, Muldon, Egypt, Strong and Buena Vista. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a storm shelter or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
